name: Just Another Day: 2020
description:
Experience the 2020 Pandemic in a game meant to bring attention to the "New Normal", where you have to complete tasks while avoiding getting infected from strangers without any facemask.

Long-story short, this game was done as part of my school's final output this sem. This is my first time using a proper game engine, Godot, and I'm so glad I finally know how to program. This is the culmination of my first month of learning how to program videogames TwT

Also, a slight notice: 

         If the game triggers your antivirus, it's because I had to use Resource Hacker to change the .ico file of the .exe in order to have it use the custom icon I made rather than Godot's basic icon. If only it was a lot easier to do that without using 3rd party software. Anyways, I won't gain anything from giving people viruses anyways, and I doubt my 1 month of programming skills is enough to even make a virus. Anyways, have fun

Another notice: 

     Due to this being a mere school project and only meant to kickstart my programming skills, it will forever be stuck at Beta 0.4 I have no intentions to continue development nor finish this game. The deadline for it is on Dec 14, 2020 anyways, so I kinda have to upload it now, aaaaaa-

Lead Developer:
me

MIjzie

me (hA the animations suck and I'm proud of it cause it's the best I can do TwT)
